Company Name: Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Co (4200)
Description: Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Co (known as: Aldrees) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since March 2006. Aldrees operates within the Energy sector focusing on Oil and Gas Refining and Marketing. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia and Sudan, working on Integrated Oil and Gas, Air Freight and Logistics and Oil and Gas Refining and Marketing. Aldrees is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in September 1962.

Shareholder Name: Ahmad Abdullah Al Ahmed Al Akeil
